events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under engineering roles based on your experience with software development and programming languages.
A recruiter specializing in technical positions has been assigned to your profile and will guide you through the next stages of the hiring process.
The initial screening call went well, and the recruiter noted your strong background in software engineering and relevant technical skills.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for June 10th, where you'll meet with our engineering leads to discuss your development experience.
